name: Flag Mania
description:
• Test your geography knowledge in a fun way
  • Know the many countries around the world through their flags
  • Do you have the knowledge to identify the countries around the world, test it out now
  • Make your children's geographical knowledge sharper in a fun and interactive way
  • Become a Millionaire on basis of your knowledge
  • Take part in death matches where your brain will dictate if you have it in you to survive the GK arena
  • Just enjoy the game and have fun, thank you
